results.title: Gallstones.
results.text_hl: This review summarizes the main advances made in the epidemiology, pathogenesis, and medical treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Cholelithiasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002769 @@@gallstone disease@@@ in the past year.
